thread.section_title: Ibis London Euston St Pancras - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good value, good quality
thread.title_full: Good value, good quality - Review of Ibis London Euston St Pancras, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: colin49uk
title: Good value, good quality
text:
Ibis is obviously not a premium brand but this was a modern, well presented hotel really convenient for Euston station and good for transport links around London.
Rooms are quite compact but everything you need for an overnight is there. Bed comfortable. Not noisy. Free WiFi. Kettle.
We stayed a Friday night and got a good price.
